The claim of RSS providing aid during Ke: It was found that the images were actually taken during RSS and Seva Bharti workers providing aid to victims of the Kollam Temple fire in 2016.
The expert: s verdict mentioned the Facebook page of Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh (RSS) sharing a six-year-old image as Seva Bharti workers providing aid in recent Kerala floods. This further highlighted the trend of circulating old images to create a false perception of relief work during calamities.
